response.overview: Unexplained Explained is a compelling documentary that looks deeply inside the world of the Paranormal and Supernatural. Producer Paul Wookey decides to go on a personal journey to investigate the universal ghost and spirit experience joined by psychic medium Diane Howe and a very curious film crew. Paul travels to Pendle known for its history of witchcraft and medieval practices.
response.title: Unexplained Explained: Ghostly Paranormal Activity
